snippet.title: The Splitting: Chapter 3 - Trailer
snippet.description:
* 3rd chapter coming out on March 10, 2022 *

Play first 2 chapters here for free - 
http://www.fireberrystudio.com/games/

The Splitting is a mystery adventure game by Fireberry Studio.
Daniel wakes up one morning to find out his reflection in the mirror is gone. Now, with his reflection missing, he discovers that he can pass through mirrors into the almost identical mirror world.
This is the trailer for Chapter 3, to be released on March 10, 2022.


Trailer Music by Assaf Halevi.

Support us:

Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/fireberrystudio

Ko-Fi:
https://ko-fi.com/fireberrystudio
